markdownRemark.html: A very challenging golf course situated in La Cala de Mijas in a stunning setting. There is a very well equipped pro shop on the premises with knowledgeable friendly staff, a nice club house and we recommend eating outside on the balcony overlooking the course.

frontmatter.title: Calanova Golf Club
frontmatter.description: Calanova Golf Club - A very challenging golf course situated in La Cala de Mijas in a stunning setting. There is a very well equipped pro shop on the premises with knowledgeable friendly staff, a nice club house and we recommend eating outside on the balcony overlooking the course.
frontmatter.address: Urbanización Calanova Golf Club s/n, 29649 Cala de Mijas (Málaga), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 79.00 euro,  Highest green fee weekends 79.00 euro
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
